name: codesaviour
description: CodeSaviour - AI-powered code analysis and fixing tool

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:worker
scripts.build:frontend: mkdir -p dist && cp *.html *.css *.js *.png *.ico dist/ 2>nul || echo 'Copied frontend files'
scripts.build:worker: cd server && npm install && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name codesaviour
